events.title: CHOIR ANNIVERSARY
events.details: 2017 Festival of songs and 33rd choir anniversary celebration. Featuring: Hymns, Worship, Chants, Oratorios, Nigerian Classical Anthems, Voice solos, Instrumental solos, Orchestra performance and many more.

events.title: MUSIC THEORY CLASS
events.details: This is a free music theory class organized by the choir to train young ones who are willing to be enrolled in the church choir. It is also opened to non-church members that are interested. At the end of the program, students should be able to sight-read and sight-sing effectively
